# 80s Pastel Component Library - Vite+Vike+React+Tailwind

## Project Setup Checklist

- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Get project setup info for Vite
- [ ] Scaffold Vite+React project
- [ ] Install and configure Vike
- [ ] Install and configure Tailwind CSS
- [ ] Create component folder structure
- [ ] Build 80s-styled components
- [ ] Create showcase page
- [ ] Test and run project

## Project Details
- Framework: Vite + Vike (vite-plugin-ssr) + React
- Styling: Tailwind CSS with custom 80s pastel palette
- Theme: 80s/90s VHS-inspired with geometric line art, subtle grids, and blueprint styling
- Color Palette: Dark background with teal, orange, pink/magenta, yellow gradient stripes
